divs: sighting detailsmy mother and i took my kids and thier cousins up to my sisters house for a visit.we were heading towards hwy 115\35 south,heading home.i was passenger in the front seat watching the planes up high in the cold,blue sky.i saw 4 planes in formation heading south towards lake ontario. *(1) *(2) *(3) *(4) (like this) i said they must be military,when all on a sudden there was a light not as big as the planes but just as bright behind the first plane right next to its contrail and right beside the second.it didn't seem to move,it just hung there while the other 3 planes flew past and then vanished.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Peterborough
There were no other sightings in Peterborough on or around February 14th 2005
Summary: Bright light hovering beside second of four contrails
